queriesList.name: Kubernetes EBS allocation price by day query

options.description: Kubernetes EBS allocation price by day query

queriesList.query: sum(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * 24 * 100&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: AVG Cluster Cost (last 3 days) DAILY -  query

options.description: AVG Cluster Cost (last 3 days) DAILY -  query

queriesList.query: sum(node_total_hourly_cost * 24)&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: AVG Cluster Cost (last 3 days) DAILY -  query

options.description: AVG Cluster Cost (last 3 days) DAILY -  query

queriesList.query: avg_over_time(sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [30d:1d])&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: AVG Cluster Cost (last 3 days) DAILY -  query

options.description: AVG Cluster Cost (last 3 days) DAILY -  query

queriesList.query: 1 - (avg_over_time(sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [1d:1h])/avg_over_time(sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [7d:1h]))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Cluster Hour Price (last 12h) query
queriesList.query: sum(node_total_hourly_cost)&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Estimative Cluster Cost (last 30 days based) query

options.description: Estimative Cluster Cost (last 30 days based) query

queriesList.query: sum(node_total_hourly_cost * 720)&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price) - Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price) query

options.description: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price) - Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price) query

queriesList.query: 1 - (  avg_over_time(    sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [1d:1h]  )/  avg_over_time(    sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [7d:1h]  ))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price) - Relative price now vs 1d ago (Hour Price) query

options.description: Relative price now vs (7/1)d ago (Hour Price) - Relative price now vs 1d ago (Hour Price) query

queriesList.query: 1 - (  avg(sum(node_total_hourly_cost))/  avg_over_time(    sum(node_total_hourly_cost) [1d:1h]  ))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Standard Variation of Cost by InstanceType (7d/1d) query

options.description: Standard Variation of Cost by InstanceType (7d/1d) query

queriesList.query: stdvar_over_time( sum(node_total_hourly_cost) by (instance_type) [7d:1d] ) > 0&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Top 20 by Namespace query
queriesList.query: topk( 20,   sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	) * 730) by (namespace))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Estimated Top 20 by Container (30 days) query

options.description: Estimated Top 20 by Container (30 days) query

queriesList.query: topk( 20,   sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 730				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Hour Cost query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (namespace)&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Hour Price by Container query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,namespace, instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (container,namespace, instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (namespace, container)&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Top 20 by Container query
queriesList.query: topk( 20,   sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace="{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance, namespace) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace="{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance, namespace) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Live Month Price query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) * 720&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Month Estimative avg query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) * 720&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Live Day Price query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) * 24 * 7&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Relative price now vs (7/14)d ago (Hour Price) - Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price) query

options.description: Relative price now vs (7/14)d ago (Hour Price) - Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price) query

queriesList.query:
1 - (
avg_over_time(  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (namespace) [1d:1h]            )                        /            
avg_over_time(  sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (namespace) [7d:1h]            )            )&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Namespace Hour Price query
queriesList.query: topk( 20,   sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (namespace,container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (namespace))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Hour Price by App query
queriesList.query: topk( 30,   sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Live Hour Price query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: APP  Hour Price query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			) + sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container))&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Live Hour Price query
queriesList.query: (sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	))) * 24&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price) query

options.description: Relative price now vs 7d ago (Hour Price) query

queriesList.query:
1 - (
avg_over_time(
sum(sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			) + sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container)) [1d:1h]					)/
avg_over_time(
sum(sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			) + sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container)) [7d:1h]					)					)&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: Live Hour Price query
queriesList.query: (sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			)  +   sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (container,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	))) * 24 * 30&duration=1h&step=5m

queriesList.name: APP Pods Hour Price query
queriesList.query: sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()					label_replace					(						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"					) * 0			) + sum(container_cpu_allocation{namespace=~"{{namespace}}", container=~"$app.*"}) by (namespace,instance,container) * on(instance) group_left() (	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()		  			label_replace		  			(		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"		  			) * 0		  	)) by (container)&duration=1h&step=5m
